p: As CHIKV is an arbovirus, it is very important to evaluate the virus tropism in the mosquito vectors. In this study, Aedes aegypti cell line Aag-2 and Aedes albopictus cell line C6/36 were selected to serve as two mosquito cell models. Our results suggested that both cell lines were susceptible to these two strains. Of note, in our study, Aag-2 cells were very susceptible to both CHIKV isolates but had no CPE after infection.
